snippet.title: ALIEN MARAUDER  - Official Teaser Trailer  - New REAL TIME STRATEGY Game 2021
snippet.description:
In 2672, with the breakthrough and popularization of heavy ion fusion technology, humans have completed the fifth industrial revolution, plenty of fusion engines can turn even ordinary rock into fuel, providing a steady stream of energy. Human are beings exploiting all the available energy resources on the earth without restraint, including even the other planets in the solar system. After hundreds of years of continuous exploitation, humans finally began to face the complete depletion of resources.
This situation was caused by the United Association, as the world-class organization that holds the core mining technology, to ease the pressure of resource depletion, tart to organize expeditionary forces to explore the universe for mining planets, and through mining bases and transport ships, all kinds of useful resources back to Earth and several other planets have been colonized.

Release: TBA 2021 / Windows Pc

Developer: YC Games
Publisher: YC Games

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1516750/Alien_Marauder/
